casebody.data:
Andrea MICEK-HOLT, Executrix (Estate of Edward W. Micek)
v.
Mary PAPAGEORGE et al. Mary Papageorge
v.
Andrea Micek-Holt et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 2, 2018

The petition by Mary Papageorge, a defendant in the first case and the plaintiff in the second case, and George Papageorge, a defendant in the first case, for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 180 Conn.App. 540, 183 A.3d 1215 (2018), is denied.
